element.name: A Nightime stroll in the Shade by Windsockers, Unknown Cache (2/3)

long-description.p: The cache is not at the listed coordinates to find the cache you will need to do the following:
You can only find this cache at night by looking for some luminous trail markers.
Please make sure that you take a set of back up batteries for both your torch and gps also mark your location in case with your gps in case you get lost in the woods.
The entrance to the woods is on the main Donabate to Portrane Road.
To find the starting coordinates you will need to find the A Shady stroll in the day cache the start coordinates are in the cache container.

From the given coordinates walk a short distance along the pathway and holding your torch at eye level look into the woods on your left your torch beam should light a trail marker which is about two metres off the ground. This is the starting point for the cache.

From this point follow the trailmarkers into the woods a single marker denotes continue straight ahead while a double trailmarker denotes a turn to either the left or right continue following the trailmarkers untill you see a cluster of three trail markers this is where the cache is hidden.
To get back to the main pathway from the cache location look for the single trail markers they will lead you back to the pathway.

p.font:
Remember while walking along the route take care of your footing as there are a lot of tree branches on the ground also at one point you will need to walk down a small steep incline hence the high terrain difficulty.
Please be careful of your footing in the dark, and don't forget the back-up batteries.

long-description.p: Hope your not afraid of the dark.

The Cache is an ammo box when placed it had a disposable camera with flash I'll add the photos to the cache page when the camera is full.
Please take care and rehide the cache to prevent muggles from discovering its location.

element.additional-waypoints:
FN213CE - GC213CE Final
N/S __ 째 __ . ___ W/E ___ 째 __ . ___
element.url-name: A Nightime stroll in the Shade

ul.li:
2010-05-15T19:00:00Z : Found it by Alastair74
First ever night cache and I thought it was a great idea I might have to look into it myself. Found with Wildfowler while spending the day in Dublin for the WWFM. TFTC

2010-05-15T19:00:00Z : Found it by wildfowler
Found on a caching weekend around Dublin with Alastair74! First night cache! Clever idea! Wouldn't fancy these woods when it's really dark! TNLNSL TFTC

2010-02-17T20:00:00Z : Found it by Toffee Man
This was a really enjoyable cache on a very dark night. But we had loads of torches to find our way. Thanks to Windsocker for a great nighttime cache. Toffee Man #190

2010-02-17T20:00:00Z : Write note by OBCLAN
Dropped in a geocoin here tonight.

2010-02-17T20:00:00Z : Found it by OBCLAN
Brilliant Night Time Cache. Congrats to the owner. The youngest geocachers we off like a hare out of the trap on this one. Lahtac and Navajo jnr. were blazing a trail with Night Hawk in hot pursuit. BlueJay 59 and Toffee Man were keeping an eye on the leaders to make sure thay dident get swallowed up by an "Alice in Wonderland" type hole. Me and Navajo kept up the rear to cover our tracks. Great fun. TFTC SL

wpt.name: GC213CE
wpt.desc: A Nightime stroll in the Shade by Windsockers, Unknown Cache (2/3)

groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:name: A Nightime stroll in the Shade
groundspeak:cache.groundspeak:long_description:
The cache is not at the listed coordinates to find the cache you will need to do the following:

You can only find this cache at night by looking for some luminous trail markers.

Please make sure that you take a set of back up batteries for both your torch and gps also mark your location in case with your gps in case you get lost in the woods.

The entrance to the woods is on the main Donabate to Portrane Road.

To find the starting coordinates you will need to find the A Shady stroll in the day cache the start coordinates are in the cache container.

From this point follow the trailmarkers into the woods a single marker denotes continue straight ahead while a double trailmarker denotes a turn to either the left or right continue following the trailmarkers untill you see a cluster of three trail markers this is where the cache is hidden.
To get back to the main pathway from the cache location look for the single trail markers they will lead you back to the pathway.

Remember while walking along the route take care of your footing as there are a lot of tree branches on the ground also at one point you will need to walk down a small steep incline hence the high terrain difficulty.
Please be careful of your footing in the dark, and don't forget the back-up batteries.

Hope your not afraid of the dark.

The Cache

The Cache is an ammo box when placed it had a disposable camera with flash I'll add the photos to the cache page when the camera is full.
Please take care and rehide the cache to prevent muggles from discovering its location.







The Windsockers
